attributes.action: To name Kate and William's child "Jucintha"
attributes.additional_details: In recent light of the tragic loss of Jacintha Saldanha, who under the strain and embarrassment of falling victim to a malicious and cruel radio "prank" took her life into her own hands, we feel that the government should urge The Duchess of Cambridge to name her child in rememberence of the Hospital secretary who ensured smooth and effecient communication of care at King Edward VII Hospital, while The Duchess was being treated for accute morning-sickness.
